title: What do you want to observe?

items.title: Monitor your application performance
items.description: Learn how to collect and visualize Application Performance Monitoring (APM) data with the Elastic Stack.

items.title: Monitor your application logs
items.description: Correlate your application logs and traces for increased visibility into your services.

items.title: Integrate with OpenTelemetry
items.description: Reuse your existing OTel instrumentation to easily send observability data to the Elastic Stack.

items.title: Get started
items.description: Learn how to monitor logs and infrastructure metrics from systems and services across your organization.

items.title: Integrations
items.description: Stream in and visualize logs, metrics, traces, content, and more from all the sources in your ecosystem.

items.title: User experience
items.description: Quantify and analyze the perceived performance of your web application.

items.title: Monitor your users
items.description: Deploy the Elastic APM Real User Monitoring (RUM) JavaScript Agent to add detailed performance metrics and error tracking of your web applications.

items.title: Integrate with your favorite framework
items.description: Easily integrate the RUM agent with React, Angular, and Vue applications.

items.title: Get started
items.description: Learn how to monitor logs and metrics from systems and services across your organization.

items.title: Integrations
items.description: Stream in and visualize logs, metrics, traces, content, and more from all the sources in your ecosystem.

items.title: Get started
items.description: Choose a method and create your first synthetic monitor.

items.title: Write a synthetic test
items.description: Write a synthetic test to check critical actions that an end-user might make on your site.

items.title: Analyze data from synthetic monitors
items.description: See a high-level overview of your service's availability, and dig into details to diagnose what caused downtime.

items.title: Universal Profiling
items.description: Inspect, filter, and compare your data to gain visibility and optimize performance.

items.title: Get started
items.description: Set up Universal Profiling in Elastic Cloud and install your host-agent.
